meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful pantdress to the party.

meanings.sent3: The pantdress danced around the room on its own!

meanings.sent5: The pantdress stood out in the crowd with its unique design.

meanings.sent1: Her passion is in the art of pantdress creation.
